casebody.data:
IN RE LARRY D. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 15, 2017

David B. Rozwaski, in support of the petition.

Daniel M. Salton, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent father for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 758, 155 A.3d 322 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
